title: Barsony New Belt Loop OWB Holster for .380 and Ultra Compact 9mm 40 45
features: Outside the Waistband Carry Belt LOOP Holster makes a steady platform for drawing and re-holstering gun; belt loop allows wear on trouser belt or holster belt up to 2.5" wide.
Constructed from laminate Cordura nylon, waterproof closed-cell foam padding and smooth nylon lining.
Adjustable thumb-break retention strap protected by Strap Trap that covers Velcro adjustment.
The photo shows a RIGHT-HAND DRAW.
Barsony New Belt Loop OWB Holster is compatible with gun make/model sizes listed in the drop down menu.
